title: cryptohappening
author: cryptohappening
content: I noticed a lot of times when searching for ways to make passive income, people come up with ideas that don't align with the definition of passive. As a result, I wanted to think up of ideas and create a list that truly is passive. If you're interested, you can find my list at https://www.passivecash.xyz/. If you're not comfortable visiting that link, the website is hosted by GitHub pages. You can find the GitHub repository and read the contents of the main page at https://github.com/stevob14/passivecash/blob/master/index.md

comments.author: cryptohappening
comments.body: No problem  . I hope it was helpful

comments.author: mich
comments.body: I conduct a great deal of business online. Whether it’s selling products on Amazon or eBay or simply selling my services. Being dependent on the Internet for my business has many advantages and disadvantages.Some of the advantages are I have working online is the flexibility. Where I choose to work and what hours I prefer is fantastic. Some of the disadvantages are that people expect a much faster response time then is optimal for my preferred lifestyle.
